patthana4.6:1.1_0: Akusalaṁ kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.6:4.1_0: Kusalaṁ nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.6:31.1_1: anantare dve …pe… upanissaye cattāri …pe… kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

patthana4.6:46.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca,
patthana4.6:46.1_1: anantare cattāri …pe… sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri,
patthana4.6:46.1_2: purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve,
patthana4.6:48.1_0: Akusalaṁ kilesasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo kilesasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkiliṭṭhadukasadisaṁ.)
patthana4.6:49.1_0: Akusalaṁ kilesañceva saṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.6:52.1_0: Kusalaṁ saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
